about_the_game:
This free DLC adds the NVIDIA Broadcast Tracker to VTube Studio. You can only use it if you have a NVIDIA RTX GPU.

This tracker uses the highly optimized NVIDIA GPU Tensor cores to run face tracking to provide high-quality and performant face tracking that can run along any game or streaming software.

The tracker is pretty big (~2 GB currently), so make sure you have enough space on your hard drive.
detailed_description:
This free DLC adds the NVIDIA Broadcast Tracker to VTube Studio. You can only use it if you have a NVIDIA RTX GPU.

This tracker uses the highly optimized NVIDIA GPU Tensor cores to run face tracking to provide high-quality and performant face tracking that can run along any game or streaming software.

The tracker is pretty big (~2 GB currently), so make sure you have enough space on your hard drive.
legal_notice: This app is an indie production and is not developed by Live2D Inc., but is officially licensed to use the Live2D Cubism SDK.
name: VTube Studio - NVIDIA Broadcast Tracker

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Any NVIDIA RTX GPU (you need RTX for this)
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: RTX 3060
  • Storage: 3 GB available space

short_description: Download this free DLC to enable the NVIDIA Broadcast Tracker in VTube Studio. Requires a NVIDIA RTX GPU.
supported_languages: English, Japanese, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese
